tr.style: border: 1px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

description.value: Logical model describing the model for the prescription laboratory. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for laboratory.

short.value: The NIHDI of the prescribing healthcare party
NIHDI of co prescriber substitute party
Status of co prescribing status (to sign, signed or refused)
The SSIN of the person for which the laboratory is prescribed.
A reference to the provider party (e.g. a NIHDI number for a healthcare professional, a SSIN or only a displaystring for a non professional caregiver,...)
Required discipline of the provider party
Reference ID of the UHMEP once availaboratoryle there
When this prescription is executed, availaboratoryle after start of execution
Parties that shall be informed of the results of the prescription other then the prescriber.
